description:
After escaping from their coffin prison, Usopp, Chopper, and Nami do battle with a garden full of adorably dead zombie animals!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Bunch of Animals? Perona`s Wonder Garden!
Des animaux partout ? Le jardin des merveilles de Perona
Doubutsu Ippai? Perona no Wonder Garden
مجموعة من الحيوانات؟ حديقة عجائب بيرونا
動物いっぱい? ペローナの不思議の庭[ワンダーガーデン]
